name: SmartLab
0:
”Alexa, launch smart lab”
”there is an acid spill”
”list of equipment's in the lab”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart lab
des:
The "Smart Lab" custom Alexa skill is used inside the laboratories to get information about lab safety protocols and to know the calibration details of the equipment's available in the laboratory. The skill has both audio and display capabilities and can be accessed on devices with/without screen.

Features of Skill:
- Provide safety instructions to be followed when there is a spill in the laboratory.
- Provide safety instructions when there is an fire/fire-aid incident.
- Provide calibration details of equipment available in the laboratory.
- Provide equipment's list that were calibrated (or) due for calibration based on the time period.

Example utterances to launch the skill:
- Alexa, launch smart lab
- Alexa, open smart lab

Few example utterances that can be used after launching the skill:
- Need help with the skill
- There is a spill in the laboratory
- Need calibration details of equipment's
- List of equipment's in the lab
- What are equipment's were calibrated last month

The skill currently support only English (US) and is available only in US, UK and India regions.

Disclaimer:
- The skill capabilities are very specific to the use-case & industry and may not be helpful to all audience.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
